title: CONTENTS.
content:
THE BOOK AM-TUAT:--THE TITLE OF THE WORK

THE FIRST DIVISION, OR WESTERN VESTIBULE, OF THE TUAT, CALLED NET-RA With 8 Illustrations

THE SECOND DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED URNES. With 11 Illustrations

THE THIRD DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED NET-NEB-UA-KHEPER-AUT. With 13 Illustrations

THE FOURTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED ANKHET-KHEPERU. With 7 Illustrations

THE FIFTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED AMENT. With 8 Illustrations

THE SIXTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED METCHET-MU-NEBT-TUAT. With 19 Illustrations

THE SEVENTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED THEPHET-SHETA. With 18 Illustrations

THE EIGHTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED TEBAT-NETERU-S. With 17 Illustrations

THE NINTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED BEST-ARU-ANKHET-KHEPERU. With 18 Illustration

THE TENTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED METET-QA-UTCHEBU. With 22 Illustrations

THE ELEVENTH DIVISION OF THE TUAT, CALLED RE-EN-QERERT-APT-KHATU. With 26 Illustrations

THE TWELFTH DIVISION, OR EASTERN VESTIBULE, OF THE TUAT, CALLED KHEPER-KEKIU-KHAU-MESTU. With 13 Illustrations

P. 32, l. 1, for "phallus" read "Ass"; p. 60, l. 13, for "Hon" read "Hou"; ibid., l. 19, for "confieh" read "coufieh"; p. 70, l. 7, for ### read ### p. 81, l. 6, for read ###; p. 139, l. 3, for "Thephet-Asar" read "Thephet-shetat"; p. 256, l. 3, for "Then-neteru" read "Kheper-kekiu-khau-mestu."
